verses.verse: Therefore, thou son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, prophesy<WH5012> against Gog<WH1463>, and say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, I am against thee, O Gog<WH1463>, the chief<WH7218> prince<WH5387> of Meshech<WH4902> and Tubal<WH8422>:

And I will turn thee back<WH7725>, and leave but the sixth part<WH8338> of thee, and will cause thee to come up<WH5927> from the north<WH6828> parts<WH3411>, and will bring<WH935> thee upon the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>: leave: or, strike thee with six plagues: or, draw thee back with an hook of six teeth the north: Heb. the sides of the north
And I will smite<WH5221> thy bow<WH7198> out of thy left<WH8040> hand<WH3027>, and will cause thine arrows<WH2671> to fall<WH5307> out of thy right<WH3225> hand<WH3027>.

Thou shalt fall<WH5307> upon the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>, thou, and all thy bands<WH102>, and the people<WH5971> that is with thee: I will give<WH5414> thee unto the ravenous<WH5861> birds<WH6833> of every sort<WH3671>, and to the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> to be devoured<WH402>. sort: Heb. wing to be: Heb. to devour
Thou shalt fall<WH5307> upon the open<WH6440> field<WH7704>: for I have spoken<WH1696> it, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>. the open: Heb. the face of the field

And I will send<WH7971> a fire<WH784> on Magog<WH4031>, and among them that dwell<WH3427> carelessly<WH983> in the isles<WH339>: and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>. carelessly: or, confidently

So will I make my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034> known<WH3045> in the midst<WH8432> of my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>; and I will not let them pollute<WH2490> my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034> any more: and the heathen<WH1471> shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>, the Holy One<WH6918> in Israel<WH3478>.
Behold, it is come<WH935>, and it is done<WH1961>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; this is the day<WH3117> whereof I have spoken<WH1696>.

And they that dwell<WH3427> in the cities<WH5892> of Israel<WH3478> shall go forth<WH3318>, and shall set<WH1197> on fire<WH784> and burn<WH5400> the weapons<WH5402>, both the shields<WH4043> and the bucklers<WH6793>, the bows<WH7198> and the arrows<WH2671>, and the handstaves<WH3027> <WH4731>, and the spears<WH7420>, and they shall burn<WH1197> them with fire<WH784> seven<WH7651> years<WH8141>: handstaves: or, javelins burn them: or, make a fire of them

So that they shall take<WH5375> no wood<WH6086> out of the field<WH7704>, neither cut down<WH2404> any out of the forests<WH3293>; for they shall burn<WH1197> the weapons<WH5402> with fire<WH784>: and they shall spoil<WH7997> those that spoiled<WH7997> them, and rob<WH962> those that robbed<WH962> them, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.

And it shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, that I will give<WH5414> unto Gog<WH1463> a place<WH4725> there of graves<WH6913> in Israel<WH3478>, the valley<WH1516> of the passengers<WH5674> on the east<WH6926> of the sea<WH3220>: and it shall stop<WH2629> the noses of the passengers<WH5674>: and there shall they bury<WH6912> Gog<WH1463> and all his multitude<WH1995>: and they shall call<WH7121> it The valley<WH1516> of Hamongog<WH1996>. noses: or, mouths Hamongog: that is, The multitude of Gog
And seven<WH7651> months<WH2320> shall the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> be burying<WH6912> of them, that they may cleanse<WH2891> the land<WH776>.

Yea, all the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> shall bury<WH6912> them; and it shall be to them a renown<WH8034> the day<WH3117> that I shall be glorified<WH3513>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.

And they shall sever out<WH914> men<WH582> of continual employment<WH8548>, passing through<WH5674> the land<WH776> to bury<WH6912> with the passengers<WH5674> those that remain<WH3498> upon the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH776>, to cleanse<WH2891> it: after the end<WH7097> of seven<WH7651> months<WH2320> shall they search<WH2713>. men: Heb. men of continuance

And the passengers<WH5674> that pass through<WH5674> the land<WH776>, when any seeth<WH7200> a man's<WH120> bone<WH6106>, then shall he set up<WH1129> a sign<WH6725> by<WH681> it, till the buriers<WH6912> have buried<WH6912> it in the valley<WH1516> of Hamongog<WH1996>. set up: Heb. build
And also the name<WH8034> of the city<WH5892> shall be Hamonah<WH1997>. Thus shall they cleanse<WH2891> the land<WH776>. Hamonah: that is, The multitude

And, thou son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Speak<WH559> unto every feathered<WH3671> fowl<WH6833>, and to every beast<WH2416> of the field<WH7704>, Assemble<WH6908> yourselves, and come<WH935>; gather<WH622> yourselves on every side<WH5439> to my sacrifice<WH2077> that I do sacrifice<WH2076> for you, even a great<WH1419> sacrifice<WH2077> upon the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>, that ye may eat<WH398> flesh<WH1320>, and drink<WH8354> blood<WH1818>. unto: Heb. to the fowl of every wing my sacrifice: or, my slaughter

Ye shall eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of the mighty<WH1368>, and drink<WH8354> the blood<WH1818> of the princes<WH5387> of the earth<WH776>, of rams<WH352>, of lambs<WH3733>, and of goats<WH6260>, of bullocks<WH6499>, all of them fatlings<WH4806> of Bashan<WH1316>. goats: Heb. great goats
And ye shall eat<WH398> fat<WH2459> till ye be full<WH7654>, and drink<WH8354> blood<WH1818> till ye be drunken<WH7943>, of my sacrifice<WH2077> which I have sacrificed<WH2076> for you.

Thus ye shall be filled<WH7646> at my table<WH7979> with horses<WH5483> and chariots<WH7393>, with mighty men<WH1368>, and with all men<WH376> of war<WH4421>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.

And I will set<WH5414> my glory<WH3519> among the heathen<WH1471>, and all the heathen<WH1471> shall see<WH7200> my judgment<WH4941> that I have executed<WH6213>, and my hand<WH3027> that I have laid<WH7760> upon them.
So the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068> their God<WH430> from that day<WH3117> and forward<WH1973>.

And the heathen<WH1471> shall know<WH3045> that the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> went into captivity<WH1540> for their iniquity<WH5771>: because they trespassed<WH4603> against me, therefore hid<WH5641> I my face<WH6440> from them, and gave<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of their enemies<WH6862>: so fell<WH5307> they all by the sword<WH2719>.
According to their uncleanness<WH2932> and according to their transgressions<WH6588> have I done<WH6213> unto them, and hid<WH5641> my face<WH6440> from them.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Now will I bring again<WH7725> the captivity<WH7622> <WH7622> of Jacob<WH3290>, and have mercy<WH7355> upon the whole house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, and will be jealous<WH7065> for my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034>;

After that they have borne<WH5375> their shame<WH3639>, and all their trespasses<WH4604> whereby they have trespassed<WH4603> against me, when they dwelt<WH3427> safely<WH983> in their land<WH127>, and none made them afraid<WH2729>.

When I have brought them again<WH7725> from the people<WH5971>, and gathered<WH6908> them out of their enemies'<WH341> lands<WH776>, and am sanctified<WH6942> in them in the sight<WH5869> of many<WH7227> nations<WH1471>;

Then shall they know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068> their God<WH430>, which caused them to be led into captivity<WH1540> among the heathen<WH1471>: but I have gathered<WH3664> them unto their own land<WH127>, and have left<WH3498> none of them any more there. which: Heb. by my causing of them, etc
Neither will I hide<WH5641> my face<WH6440> any more from them: for I have poured out<WH8210> my spirit<WH7307> upon the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.
